comments.comment: Yes. this is a true story. I know this because I was in Maha Uva Estate. Not only this, the orange plantation of Bibilay also was ruined by foreign intervention. It was told to me by one of my friend whose native place is Bibilay. The funny thing is Agricultura department has not taken any effort to help Mr. Martin to continue the plantation in some other location. This is call Sri Lanka.
